Key Match Events: Lane Thomas hit a three-run homer in a five-run outburst before Detroit got an out
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the first between the franchises and Central division rivals in the postseason
Others: Tanner Bibee pitched 4 2/3 innings before Guardians manager Stephen Vogt swung the door open to baseball's best bullpen to finish off the Tigers
David Fry added a two-run double for the Guardians
Steven Kwan got it rolling with a leadoff double against Tigers starter Tyler Holton
Josh Naylor's RBI single made it 2-0
Zach McKinstry misplayed a hard hopper by José Ramírez for an error, allowing Kwan to score
The Guardians sent nine batters to the plate in the first with Thomas' moon shot into the left-field bleachers opening the 5-0 lead
Tarik Skubal, the favorite to win the AL Cy Young Award, is expected to face Guardians RHP Matthew Boyd in Game 2
Alex Cobb, a candidate to start Game 3, was added to the ALDS roster after finishing the regular season on the injured list with a blister on his middle finger
